module.name: postureRecorder
module.description: Just a way to record upper body postures with the joystick
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: A simple module for recording postures of the robot in a format compatible with the iCubClient. Whenever the user presses the blue button a new posture is recorded. When he presses the yellow one the postures are dumped to a file that can be loaded by iCubClient.

param.desc: To specify the module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name
